column3: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.

You don't want to love - your eternal and abnormal craving is to be loved. You aren't positive, you're negative. You absorb, absorb, as if you must fill yourself up with love, because you've got a shortage somewhere.
Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.
Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
The flame of anger, bright and brief, sharpens the barb of love.
I love coffee. It's one of my favorite things in the world, and I love tasting different coffees.
To me, accessorizing is the most fun part of an outfit. While I don't think you can't rely on accessories to make a dress that isn't working work, I do love jewelry and handbags more than anything.
The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.

Not necessity, not desire - no, the love of power is the demon of men. Let them have everything - health, food, a place to live, entertainment - they are and remain unhappy and low-spirited: for the demon waits and waits and will be satisfied.
You may call God love, you may call God goodness. But the best name for God is compassion.
I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
The thing I loved the most - and still love the most about teaching - is that you can connect with an individual or a group, and see that individual or group exceed their limits.
I love spending time with my dog, my niece and my family. I'm very family-oriented.
Breakfast is a big deal. I love it.
I absolutely love to relax and have fun. I like socializing; I like chatting. I like dancing, mixing with friends.
Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
Love is a game that two can play and both win.
Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
